item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Researchers launch "moonshot" to cure blindness through eye transplants (84 points | 50 comments)
2. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (142 points | 78 comments)
3. ChatGPT Pro (582 points | 871 comments)
4. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (18 points | 2 comments)
5. The Death of Intel: When Boards Fail (114 points | 71 comments)
6. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (143 points | 121 comments)
7. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (296 points | 82 comments)
8. Lossless Log Aggregation - Reduce Log Volume by 99% Without Dropping Data (37 points | 21 comments)
9. Litdb – type safe SQL for JavaScript/TS (61 points | 39 comments)
10. See how a lab-grown diamond is made (7 points | discuss)
11. Researchers get 'compact' hard X-ray machine to work (82 points | 18 comments)
12. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (154 points | 17 comments)
13. Show HN: Banan-OS, an Unix-like operating system written from scratch (210 points | 32 comments)
14. Why housing shortages cause homelessness (31 points | 29 comments)
15. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (82 points | 18 comments)

20. Accidentally writing a fast SAT solver (80 points | 19 comments)
21. 65% of Employees Bypass Cybersecurity Measures, New Study Finds (14 points | 5 comments)
22. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Dev Advocate ( | hide)
23. A transport protocol's view of Starlink (71 points | 18 comments)
24. The correct amount of ads is zero (33 points | 7 comments)
25. An Interview with Bill Watterson (1987) (124 points | 71 comments)
26. Message order in Matrix: right now, we are deliberately inconsistent (119 points | 84 comments)
27. Haunted by my own projects (103 points | 40 comments)
28. The Pitchforks Are Coming for Us Plutocrats (2014) (60 points | 9 comments)
29. AmpereOne: Cores Are the New MHz (114 points | 76 comments)
30. The Acton Programming Language (44 points | 22 comments)
